docstring.long_description:
The connection is made with the VISA address in the Flojoy UI.

This block should also work with compatible Tektronix scopes (untested):
MDO4xxx, MSO4xxx, and DPO4xxx.
docstring.short_description: Connect Flojoy to a MDO3XXX oscilloscope.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The VISA address to connect to.

parameters.name: num_channels
parameters.description: The number of channels on the instrument that are currently in use.
